content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your electrical service needs. May I start by getting your name, please?
Thank you, Mary. Could you please provide me with the address where the electrical service is needed?
Thank you. Let me check if this address is within our service area.
I'm sorry, Mary, but it looks like 123 Maple Street is outside our service area. We want to make sure you get the best service. Would you like me to help you find a provider closer to your location?
Hmm, I really need someone reliable and am hoping you can make an exception. Can you check again?
I understand your concern, Mary. I'll double-check our service boundaries right now.
Unfortunately, 123 Maple Street is confirmed to be outside our coverage area. I want to make sure you get the help you need. May I suggest contacting a local electrician recommended nearby?
